name: rlm-sandbox
description: Sandboxed Python execution and zero-context doc search for Claude Code. Runs code in Docker containers with no network access or API key exposure. Indexes documentation into memvid .mv2 files for hybrid BM25+vector search at ~5ms latency. Includes DSPy sub-agent support via Haiku 4.5 with deep reasoning signatures, session persistence, parallel sub-LLM calls, programmatic tool calling from sandbox code, session auto-capture, token usage tracking, and one-call research automation. Ships 21 MCP tools across five categories: sandbox execution, knowledge store, doc fetching, Apple docs, and research management.
